subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: The word “together” has become loaded in the Grizzlies-Thunder series, which involves teams with different philosophies. One operates a sharing-is-caring offensive system, while the other relies on a superstar tandem.
snippet: The word “together” has become loaded in the Grizzlies-Thunder series, which involves teams with different philosophies. One operates a sharing-is-caring offensive system, while the other relies on a superstar tandem.
